query:
select 
	                COALESCE(i2.id, '') id,
                    i.name item_name,
                    i.picture item_picture,
                    i.id item_id,
                    i2.amount amount,
                    i.game_id game_id
                from items i 
                left join inventories i2 on i.id = i2.item_id
                WHERE i.game_id = $1
                limit $2 offset $3
